mainSection.title: Frontend Web Developer
mainSection.subtitle2: Everything is possible in the world of programming, that's why it's my passion.
mainSection.subtitle: Maybe I don't have the solution to your problem, but I'm certain we'll find it.

aboutme.greeting: Hi, I’m Ignacio. Nice to meet you.
aboutme.description: I´m a Frontend Web Developer who works with modern technologies that allow building robust and attractive web applications. In my spare time, I like to work on personal projects and I´m eager to continue developing my skills to contribute to the success of projects in the future.
aboutme.tech: I have experience using React, Angular, and Node.js. I'm familiar with relational databases like SQL and non-relational databases like MongoDB. Futhermore, I'm comfortable working with design frameworks like Material UI and using Tailwind CSS to create modern, responsive interfaces.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Some of the personal projects I have been working on recently.
projects.twitter: Twitter clone with its main functionalities. The technologies used in this proyect were React, Node Js and Mongo DB.
projects.ecommerce: Next proyect I ´ll develop, it ´ll be an Ecommerce.
projects.thalamus: Thalamus is a global SaaS marketing platform to connect your company with consumers, retailers, sales force and distributors.
projects.rolThalamus: I perform maintenance and improvements in PWAs that use Angular, PHP, Laravel, Lumen and MySQL technologies.
